description:
Named an Apple Great App and featured on the App Store Homepage, TouchTV brings high quality TV highlights to the iPad. 

Instantly watch the best clips from major TV networks with a single touch.  Easily surf through channels with a swipe, and seamlessly share your favorite videos to Facebook. 

Watch your Facebook channel to see the videos being shared with you. Now with Retina Display, TouchTV looks more amazing than ever.

Start watching your TouchTV today!

What people are saying: 

- "TouchTV has the slickest interface of all the video apps." TechCrunch
- "TouchTV: A simple app for snack-size TV on the iPad. It's ideal." TIME Magazine
- "TouchTV, the future of TV. This makes a lot of sense to me." Robert Scoble
- "You rock, seriously. Love it. Fantastic iPad app." @robgorczyga
releaseNotes:
Video player bug fix, plus all the great features from 1.2.3: 

★ Longer length TV. TouchTV channels now have longer length content.
★ Lighter & Faster. Seamlessly swipe and navigate easier than ever before.
★ Like Any Video. Now with Facebook's new Like for iPad & iPhone, you can like any video.
